amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $3,000,000 for the Long Range Biometric Target Identification System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1257 agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 1257 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S9391; text: CR S9391) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $3,000,000 for the Long Range Biometric Target Identification System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1257 agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1257 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich.
